meanings.sent1: The unalerted hiker wandered into the forest without knowing about the dangerous animals.
meanings.sent2: The unalerted driver missed the road sign and took the wrong turn.
meanings.sent3: The unalerted student missed the important announcement and ended up being the only one unprepared for the test.
meanings.sent4: Her unalerted mind was like a closed door, unaware of the chaos outside.
meanings.sent5: The unalerted squirrel was an easy target for the sneaky fox.

meanings.sent1: The unalerted guard failed to notice the intruder sneaking into the building.
meanings.sent2: The unalerted child accidentally knocked over the vase while playing.
meanings.sent3: The unalerted cat slept peacefully while the mischievous puppy caused chaos around the house.
meanings.sent4: His unalerted senses were like a sleeping bear, unaware of the dangers lurking nearby.
meanings.sent5: The unalerted lifeguard failed to notice the struggling swimmer in the pool.
